title: VERY Low Grade 20 Card T206 Beater Lot PRICED INDIVIDUALLY
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: VERY Low Grade 20 Card T206 Beater Lot PRICED INDIVIDUALLY
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following 20 card T206 lot available for sale.  As you can see by the scans, these are about as low grade as they come.  There is a Southern Leaguer and a few less common backs.  T206 lots under $10 per card are pretty much non-existent anymore so this is a quick and inexpensive way to cross a bunch off your checklist.  Thanks for looking and feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

cards pictured:

Take the remaining 13 for $90 delivered.

Sights for sore eyes... Ouch....  LOL

One last bump for a price drop on these beauties before I list them on eBay or use them as kindling for the campfire.  All prices are delivered.  Thanks!
